description: Detects different loaders as described in various threat reports on Lazarus group activity
name: Lazarus Loaders
query: ((process.command_line:*cmd.exe\ \/c\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \-p\ 0x* AND process.command_line:(*C\:\\ProgramData\\* OR *C\:\\RECYCLER\\*)) OR (process.command_line:*rundll32.exe\ * AND process.command_line:*C\:\\ProgramData\\* AND process.command_line:(*.bin,* OR *.tmp,* OR *.dat,* OR *.io,* OR *.ini,* OR *.db,*)))
author: Florian Roth
wagga
